string.text: To answer the call for help
To destroy a RAID of bandits
To offer assistance to the leader of the neutrals
To offer your help to BES
To help the beginner from the landfill
To destroy a RAID of bandits
Talk to the commander of the Outpost

Debt: "All welcome, says an Outpost of the Debt on the landfill. From the dark Valley towards the bar there is a wave of mutants. Anyone who will help to shoot vermin, appreciation from our side we guarantee. The Word Debt."
Quest for passage to the Bar
Find out on the Gray Arrow

Demon: "Bandit spawn is trying to gain control over the Dump. Here half an hour ago there was a fight. Three other guys we put. The rest of The lads stepped back, but obviously that's coming back with reinforcements. We have a little extra barrel will not interfere. If you help us destroy their reinforcements, then I'll stay."
In a graveyard of machinery skirmish between the neutrals and the bandits. Neutrals strayed, but call for help.
